tooltip.platformprecision.align_pitch: Whether to align your pitch or not.
tooltip.platformprecision.align_pitch_to: Where to align your pitch to. 0 is straight up, 90 is straight forward, 180 is straight down.
tooltip.platformprecision.align_yaw: Whether to align your yaw or not.
tooltip.platformprecision.yaw_interval: The interval (in degrees) between positions to which you can align your yaw to. 360 should be divisible by this number.
tooltip.platformprecision.move_position: Whether to move your position or not. Will be automatically disabled if yaw interval is not 90.
tooltip.platformprecision.check_void: Whether to check if there is a block underneath you. Keep this on if move position is on.
